tool_description: An API showing all the lasts climatechange news around the world
name: Clamate Change
title: Clamate Change

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News_copy
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clamate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clamate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
